concept.title: VCF DPF
concept.shortdesc: The VCF DPF processes a VCF file.

conbody.p: Because a VCF data file is typically so large (on the order of gigabytes), a VCF file is always parsed into records while the file is being ingested. If you monitor ingestion of a VCF file (using the Task Monitoring pane of the System Metrics), you will always see the ingest task chained to the derive task for VCF files.
Once the ingestion process finishes, the file that was uploaded to the distributed file system is removed.
